name: The Red Scarf
description:
Post-post-apocalyptic metroidvania where you traverse through a level using your special red scarf. It was made over the course of 8 weeks by 3 game developers as our final game project for our Indie Game Development course.

Lead Programmer and Sound Tech:  Simon Persson.

Lead Designer and Programmer: Mikael Tägt.

Lead Artist: Robin Lidén.

External Sound Designers: Maximilian Gidlund and Hugo Rauer.
